desc: Our menu features local and organically grown produce with an emphasis on plant based, gluten-free, paleo, keto and vegan items. We offer free-trade coffee from Cafe Mam Coffee Roasters, a variety from Astoria Tea Company, cold pressed juices, smoothies and bone broth made in house. We are located in Astoria, OR.

layout.text:
Our menu offers made-to-order and grab-and-go items featuring local and organically grown produce with an emphasis on plant based, gluten-free, paleo, keto and vegan options. We brew up organic, free-trade coffee from Cafe Mam Coffee Roasters, a variety of teas curated by Astoria Tea Company, cold pressed juices, smoothies and bone broth made in house.
Located at 332 10th St Astoria, OR.
